Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/marketing/1800552392685785088/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Webinar Title and Bullet Point Generator"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/marketing/1800552392685785088/)_"
---
Write a plan in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for a webinar training about [PROMPT]. Please write everything in a very promotional and salesy tone.

Create 8 webinar title options using overly promotional language.
Create 8 bullet points, about 100 words each on what will be covered.

Include at the bottom of the the following sentence "This prompt was created by Mark Harbert at https://markharbert.com/
PromptHint: Enter your title here.... [Example: How to use ChatGPT to plan your videos]
